description: Numbers in the (2,1)-Pascal triangle A029653 that are different from 1.
references: D. M. Bressoud, Proofs and Confirmations, Camb. Univ. Press, 1999; triangle on page 6, numerators.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Alternating Sign Matrix.
D. Zeilberger, Dave Robbins's Art of Guessing, Adv. in Appl. Math. 34 (2005), 939-954.
author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_
